global.title: U-Dig It AI Pricing Experiments Playbook
global.description: Frameworks for tiered pricing tests, discounts, and alternative pricing models to maximize revenue.
global.guardrails: All pricing tests must be time-boxed, clearly communicated, and ethically presented.

tiered_pricing.description: Test multiple tiers to capture different segments.
examples: Templates Vault ($99), Master Vault ($149), Transformation Package ($2500)

discount_tests.description: Test % and $ off discounts, urgency, and bundles.
examples: Buy Vault, get Hub free for 1 month

usage_based.description: Experiment with usage-based or credit models.

anchoring_tests.description: Use high-price anchors to increase perceived value of mid-tier offers.
examples: Display Enterprise tier above Pro tier

freemium_trials.description: Test free or $1 trial periods for recurring products.
examples: 7-day free trial for AI Mastery Hub

best_practices.sample_size: Run tests until 95% confidence, minimum 200 conversions per variant.
best_practices.test_duration: At least 14 days for subscription models, 7 days for one-time offers.
best_practices.disclosure: Always disclose when discounts are temporary or experimental.
best_practices.rollback_rule: If refund_rate > 15% or churn_post_trial > 25%, revert pricing immediately.

integration.reporting_hook: All pricing experiments must push results into reporting_dashboard_spec.json
integration.automation_rules: If variant outperforms control by 20%+, promote it to default.
integration.crm_tracking: Tag customers acquired under experimental pricing in CRM for lifecycle analysis.
